dcterms:creator: M. Samvelyan
F. A. Oliehoek
C. Amato
dcterms:description: The StarCraft Multi-Agent Challenge (SMAC) is a benchmark for evaluating multi-agent reinforcement learning algorithms, specifically designed to test the performance of algorithms in cooperative settings within the StarCraft II environment.
dcterms:title: StarCraft Multi-Agent Challenge (SMAC)

dcterms:creator: T. Rashid
M. Samvelyan
P. Sunehag
dcterms:description: The Stochastic Two-Step Game is a simplified environment used to demonstrate the capabilities of the DFAC framework, featuring stochastic rewards and multiple agents making decisions in a two-step process.
dcterms:title: Stochastic Two-Step Game
